original_text: In the one case tithes are received by mortal men, but in the other case, by one of whom it is testified that he lives.
korean_text: 또 여기는 죽을 자들이 십분의 일을 받으나 저기는 산다고 증거를 얻은 자가 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: In the one case tithes are received by mortal men
sentences.korean_translation: 한 경우에는 십일조가 죽을 사람들에게 받아지지만

sentences.original_text: by one of whom it is testified
